product_name: Wahoo Fitness TICKR Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap
long_description: From the creators of the first Bluetooth heart rate monitor comes the Wahoo Fitness TICKR Heart Rate Monitor chest strap. Its easy-to-use design makes tracking your training simple and fun.
short_description: From the creators of the first Bluetooth heart rate monitor comes the Wahoo Fitness TICKR Heart Rate Monitor chest strap. Its easy-to-use design makes tracking your training simple and fun.
